item.title: The Vice Guide To Film Russia
item.description: The Parallel Cinema movement that emerged in the 1980s was a fascinating mixture of old Soviet avant-garde agitprop film-making and something called Necro-realism that was a comment on the impending fall of the Soviet system. Shane finds the surviving members of this movement and documents a new Parallel film in production.

item.title: The Vice Guide To Film Mexico
item.description: Shane Smith goes to Mexico City to hang out with Mario Almada and other actors, directors and producers who play key roles in what is called the 'Video-Home' industry. He visits some sets both in Mexico City and Sinaloa, northern Mexico, where the drug trade is both very real and reaches mythological proportions.

item.title: The Vice Guide To Film North Korea
item.description: Shane Smith visits North Korea to try and penetrate the Korean Feature Film Studio. Posing as a fan of Arirang the famous North Korean mass gymnastic games and national pastime Shane is going to try and get into North Korea and get himself invited to the Pyongyang production studio.

item.title: Prostitutes of God
item.description: In Prostitutes of God, VBS travels to the Indian city of Sangli to meet a group of sex workers selling their bodies in the name of the Hindu Goddess Yellamma. Local sex worker Anitha invites us for lunch in her brothel; shows us her homemade sex rooms, and tells us what its like to be a religious prostitute in modern India.

item.title: Rage Highlights Episode 14
item.description: A selection of the best new clips from all independent bands and artists from the weekend.

item.title: Rage Highlights Episode 13
item.description: A selection of the best new clips from all independent bands and artists from the weekend.

item.title: The Vice Guide To Travel Wodka Wars
item.description: In the VICE GUIDE TO TRAVEL, correspondents from Vice magazine are dispatched around the world to visit the planet's most dangerous and weird destinations.

item.title: The Queen In Australia
item.description: A record of the visit to Australia by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II and HRH the Duke of Edinburgh in 1954. The Queen in Australia is a landmark in Australian history. It not only records the first visit by a reigning monarch to Australia, it was also the first colour, feature-length documentary made in this country.

item.title: The Catherine Tate Show Series 2 Episode 5
item.description: Elaine finds new love via an Internet chatroom and Madonna is the latest famous customer Neville missed at Irene and Vern's caf. CAST: Catherine Tate.

item.title: The Catherine Tate Show Series 2 Episode 6
item.description: Allie mistakes a couple for a mother and son, then she thinks a deaf man's sign language is a charades mime. Paul pretends he doesn't find Sam funny any more. CAST: Catherine Tate.

item.title: The Catherine Tate Show Series 2 Episode 4
item.description: Nan meets Jason's girlfriend Cheryl, and Lauren has Ryan's name and face tattooed on her arms, but she ain't 'bovvered' when he dumps her. CAST: Catherine Tate.

item.title: Fawlty Towers Series 2 Episode 5 The Anniversary
item.description: More classic Basil moments in Torquay. Basil forces Polly to impersonate his wife Sybil when she goes off in a huff just before Basil's surprise anniversary party for her.

item.title: Fawlty Towers Series 2 Episode 6 Basil The Rat
item.description: More classic moments in Torquay when a spick-and-span hotel awaits the Health Inspector. Then Manuel's pet rat escapes and the Inspector arrives. The fact that the rodent's name is Basil only adds to the confusion

item.title: Little Britain Series 2 Episode 6
item.description: Love struck aide, Sebastian, finally plucks up the courage to make a move on Prime Minister Michael. Vicky Pollard shows off her new boyfriend. And Harvey and Jane's wedding day arrives.

item.title: Little Britain Series 2 Episode 5
item.description: Emily and Florence decide to play a game of tennis, a very lady-like game. Kenny Craig has got himself a girlfriend and uses his powers to ensure their dinner date runs smoothly.
